name: CostaRicaLotto
0:
”Alexa ask Costa Rica Lotto What are the winning numbers?”
”Alexa ask Costa Rica Lotto for the National Lottery winning numbers?”
”Alexa ask Costa Rica Lotto for the Winners”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: costa rica lotto
des: This skill retrieves the Costa Rica National Lottery winning numbers from the Junta de Protección Social (JPS) website, entity in charge of hosting Costa Rica National Lottery. Lottery draw is conducted every Sunday at 6pm CST, this skill provides the winning numbers of the last draw.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
